Table.Name: vSphere Hosts Last Contact < 6 Months (SW)
Table.SQL: SELECT networkdevices.deviceid as `Network Device Id`, networkdevices.name as `Device Name`, clients.name as `Client Name`, LookupDeviceCode.DeviceType as `NetworkDevice.General.Type`, IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned1.Value,edfDefault1.value),'0') as `NetworkDevice - Extra Data Field - Billing - Last Contact < 6 Months`, IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned2.Value,edfDefault2.value),'0') as `NetworkDevice - Extra Data Field - Billing - Do Not Bill` FROM NetworkDevices LEFT JOIN Locations ON (NetworkDevices.LocationId=Locations.LocationID) LEFT JOIN Clients ON (Clients.ClientId=Locations.ClientId) LEFT JOIN LookupDeviceCode ON (LookupDeviceCode.DeviceCode = NetworkDevices.DeviceType) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfAssigned1 ON (edfAssigned1.id=NetworkDevices.DeviceID and edfAssigned1.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='837c0c9b-b9f2-476d-998f-4d46440f2cf4')) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfDefault1 ON (edfDefault1.id=0 and edfDefault1.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='837c0c9b-b9f2-476d-998f-4d46440f2cf4')) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfAssigned2 ON (edfAssigned2.id=NetworkDevices.DeviceID and edfAssigned2.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='dcb55cf9-9160-4106-b9fd-fd1cb7b84fd3')) LEFT JOIN ExtraFieldData edfDefault2 ON (edfDefault2.id=0 and edfDefault2.ExtraFieldId =(Select ExtraField.id FROM ExtraField WHERE LTGuid='dcb55cf9-9160-4106-b9fd-fd1cb7b84fd3')) WHERE ((((LookupDeviceCode.DeviceType = 'vSphere Host') AND (IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned1.Value,edfDefault1.value),'0')<>0) AND (IFNULL(IFNULL(edfAssigned2.Value,edfDefault2.value),'0')=0))))
Table.SearchXML: <LabTechAbstractSearch><asn><st>AndNode</st><cn><asn><st>AndNode</st><cn><asn><st>ComparisonNode</st><lon>NetworkDevice.General.Type</lon><lok>NetworkDevice.General.Type</lok><lmo>Equals</lmo><dv>vSphere Host</dv><dk>vSphere Host</dk></asn><asn><st>ComparisonNode</st><lon>NetworkDevice.Extra Data Field.Billing.Last Contact < 6 Months</lon><lok>NetworkDevice.Edf.837c0c9b-b9f2-476d-998f-4d46440f2cf4</lok><lmo>IsTrue</lmo><dv>NULL</dv><dk>NULL</dk></asn><asn><st>ComparisonNode</st><lon>NetworkDevice.Extra Data Field.Billing.Do Not Bill</lon><lok>NetworkDevice.Edf.dcb55cf9-9160-4106-b9fd-fd1cb7b84fd3</lok><lmo>IsFalse</lmo><dv>NULL</dv><dk>NULL</dk></asn></cn></asn></cn></asn></LabTechAbstractSearch>
